english.segment1: I will give you all my worship. I will give you all my praise. You alone I long to worship. You alone are worthy of my praise
english.segment2: I will worship (echo). With all of my heart (echo). I will praise you(echo). With all of my strength (all my strength)
english.segment3: I will bow down (echo). And hail You as king (echo). I will love You (echo). Give You everything (everything)
english.segment5: Sing to You a new song from our hearts. Straight to You. From our Hearts to Yours
english.segment6: We worship Jesus. We love You Father. We worship Jesus. We love You Father. repeat
english.segment7: (I wanna give I wanna give You all the praise x5)
